name: The Carrier Bag
description:
The Carrier Bag, 2023
Hair crocheted shopping bag, 3d printed hand, eye shadow pigments, acrylic nails.
40 cm x 80 cm x 25 cm

The Carrier Bag is part of Portals*Chapter 1*: Complex Beings.

Ph. Catalina Romero
